pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface to 'EPP-Lab', a Java Program for Exploratory Projection Pursuit // An R Interface to 'EPP-lab' v1.0. 'EPP- lab' is a Java program for projection pursuit using genetic algorithms written by Alain Berro and S. Larabi Marie-Sainte and is included in the package. The 'EPP-lab' sources are available under https://github.com/fischuu/EPP-lab.git.
